attributes.action: MPs to vote on Brexit options using Alternative Vote.
attributes.additional_details: Using Alternative Vote does not bias MPs towards one option or another — this petition is not attempting to limit the options available. No matter what the path ahead, a deadlock in Parliament means preparations cannot be made.
attributes.background:
As of today, there are multiple candidate Brexit options, but Parliament is unable to form a majority for any of them.

Alternative Vote is a voting system where candidates are ranked in order of preference. If MPs rank the options in this way, one will come out the winner, breaking the deadlock.
